pkgmetadata.longdescription: **Design, run, and share computational materials science workflows**Documentation: [https://docs.matflow.io/](https://docs.matflow.io/)## AcknowledgementsMatFlow was developed using funding from the [LightForm](https://lightform.org.uk/) EPSRC programme grant ([EP/R001715/1](https://gow.epsrc.ukri.org/NGBOViewGrant.aspx?GrantRef=EP/R001715/1))
